title: Collect Delinquent Rent After Notice
description: A tenant who received a late notice is still delinquent. The PM must call them to arrange payment.

tasks.description: Identify the tenant, their total outstanding balance including late fees, and their phone number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all necessary information to make the call.

tasks.description: Call the tenant to discuss the overdue balance and request payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes the call and clearly communicates the amount due.

tasks.description: If the tenant agrees to pay, process a credit card payment over the phone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully takes a payment and provides a confirmation number to the tenant.
